select id, number, name, buildingType from t_building
id = #{id}
and number = #{number}
and buildingType = 'pedagogical'
and buildingType = 'experimental'
and buildingType = 'other'
and name like '%' #{name} '%'
order by number asc

SELECT c.id, c.name, c.credit, c.courseYear, c.term, t.name as teacher,
true as alreadyElective
false as alreadyElective
if(c.id in (SELECT course FROM t_elective WHERE student=#{id}),true,false) as alreadyElective
FROM t_course c, t_course_clazz cc, t_teacher t WHERE cc.course=c.id AND c.teacher=t.id AND cc.clazz=(SELECT clazz FROM t_student WHERE id=#{id})
and c.id in(SELECT course FROM t_elective WHERE student=#{id})
and c.id not in(SELECT course FROM t_elective WHERE student=#{id})

SELECT course.id, course.name, teacher.name teacher, course_info.beginWeek, course_info.lengthWeek, course_info.weekDay, course_info.begin, course_info.length, course_info.weekType, room.number roomNumber, building.number buildingNumber FROM t_elective elective, t_course course, t_course_info course_info, t_building building, t_room room, t_teacher teacher
WHERE elective.student = #{id} AND course.courseYear = #{year} AND course.term = #{term} AND elective.course = course.id AND course.teacher = teacher.id AND course_info.course = course.id AND course_info.address = room.id AND room.building = building.id
SELECT student.name studentName, clazz.name clazzName FROM t_student student, t_clazz clazz WHERE student.id = #{studentId} AND student.clazz = clazz.id

select student.id, student.name, student.sex, student.birth, clazz.name as clazz, specialized.name as specialized, faculty.name as faculty from t_student student, t_clazz clazz, t_specialized specialized, t_faculty faculty where student.id = #{id} and student.clazz = clazz.id and clazz.specialized = specialized.id and specialized.faculty = faculty.id

SELECT elective.id AS elective, course.NAME AS course, teacher.NAME AS teacher, course.courseYear, course.term, IF((elective.id in (SELECT elective FROM t_teach_evaluate WHERE student=#{id})),true,false) as haveDone FROM t_elective elective, t_course course, t_teacher teacher WHERE elective.student = #{id} AND course.courseYear = #{currYear} AND course.term = #{currTerm} AND course.teacher = teacher.id AND elective.course = course.id
